website_summaries.verdict: A meaty food topper that genuinely looks like a hearty soup filled with chunky pieces of tuna, beef, and carrots.
pros: 5-ingredient formula is great for avoiding food allergies
No grains, artificial colors, or preservatives
Works just as well as a topper, snack, or side-dish

customer_reviews.title: All 3 dogs LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect topper to your normal dog food. All 3 of my dogs go crazy for this as an added treat once in a blue moon to their supper.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and I’m always looking for food toppers. I like the ingredients list and my dog gobbles it up! Great find!
customer_reviews.author: nattienell

customer_reviews.title: They should call this soup
customer_reviews.text: Contains too much “broth” or whatever that liquid is. Difficult to get all the contents out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kenchman

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: My English bulldog eats this with his meal regularly. However when I bought it from amazon he started to have explosive bloody diarrhea. We stopped serving him the one from amazon and he got better. I will never buy dog food from amazon ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Product of Thailand
customer_reviews.text: This product is manufactured in Thailand. Unfortunately, the Amazon.com page doesn't explicitly state this. The only reference to it is in small print on the photograph of the back of the package. I do not feed my dog items prepared or sourced from outside the US & Canada. I am very disappointed with the Wellness brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are limited ingredients and my dog loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are limited ingredients and my dog loves getting a special treat with her dinner. She can be a picky eater and not interested in her food sometimes but will eat right away when this is added to her dinner. My only issue is having a very small dog I don't use the whole package and its not resealable. I normally just transfer the leftovers to a small tupperware and put it in the fridge so it's not really a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, but a little bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I like to spice up the dogs' food for dinner. I usually put a couple tablespoons of canned food but sometimes like to change it up. The packets are so convenient, especially when traveling, but they are more expensive. I was hoping buying in bulk would significantly reduce the price, but no. If I ever see it on sale I'll stock up. Either way, I will still purchase and give them to her.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the mini meals, but I wish Amazon offered a better selection. Simply Shreds is about 50% water, while the other ones are chunky with gravy. But I couldn't get to the store due to an injury. I ordered it in the afternoon. It arrived just before 6am, in time for my dog's breakfast. Still, it has real meat, & she likes it. I mix it with her dry kibble.
customer_reviews.author: HouseMouse

customer_reviews.title: Healthy choice for dog food
customer_reviews.text: Very good dog food My dogs love it and it is low in preservatives or added by-products that can upset my dogs stomach. Wellness brand is excellent for my Boston who has sensitive stomach Only negative issue is the price on Amazon which could be lower based on local pet store and other pet food online retailers
customer_reviews.author: KFSactown

customer_reviews.title: Good for fussy dogs who like toppings with their kibble
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way I can get my fussy terrier to eat her kibble. There is a lot of "broth" that I give to my little dog first, then the fussy one gets the topping.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my dog with a billion allergies! They don't have very many ingredients but add so much to their meals! I'm not a huge fan of how they smell but that could be a personal thing
customer_reviews.author: C. Radtka

customer_reviews.title: Maltipoo approved!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to make it a four star review because it doesn't have much chicken, but this food is high quality so I changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cheezr323

customer_reviews.title: TOP-NOTCH!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended by my very picky golden retriever! (And I must admit that it SMELLS like delicious, human food as soon as you open the packets!)
customer_reviews.author: NothinButTheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Great for a meal or a "topper"
customer_reviews.text: We add these as an occasional "topper" to the pups' grain-free Wellness kibble. They really like this small enhancement -- we divide it three ways.
customer_reviews.author: JudithTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add moisture and flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these so much she won’t eat dinner without them
customer_reviews.author: lizjohn8

customer_reviews.title: My dog lived it
customer_reviews.text: One of few dog food that my dog will eat.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA D WHITE

customer_reviews.title: More juice than chicken- very small portion
customer_reviews.text: item arrived as advertised- quality seems on par with wellness brand but there is a very small portion in each pouch, wet dog food mixed with dry goes much further than these pouches-dogs did not seem to enjoy their food anymore with shreds and juice added-priced to high- usually very happy with this brand, but I won’t reorder this product
customer_reviews.author: bethie ann

customer_reviews.title: Like the simple ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky chihuahua so this simple package with only natural ingredients is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 pouch for $20?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly it’s shame on me for not reading the description more closely, but who would ever expect a single pouch topper to be priced at $20. After receiving, I’m not sure it would have been worth the 1.70 per pouch I was expecting for a case of 12. Water based, not gravy, and very little shredded. The dog was not impressed. We’ll stick with the petite entrees.
customer_reviews.author: Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Our chihuahuas loved this
customer_reviews.text: We give this to our chihuahuas when we're traveling. They love it and I love there are only 5 ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jett Boogie

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to dry food. My dogs gobble it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FOR PICKY EATING DOGS
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG LOVE THIS....JUST MENTION FOOD SHE GOES CRAZY FOR IT......SHES EATS EVERTHING THATS MIXED IN HER FOOD BOWEL....IF YOU HAVE A PICKIY DOG TRY THIS , WATCH THEM CLEAN THE BOWEL.
customer_reviews.author: randy roberts

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loves this food & I like the ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Chopped liver

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fur baby liked the first three packs but only occasionally eats now.
customer_reviews.author: Vesta L.

customer_reviews.title: Great produce, my German Shepherds love this added to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great produce , my German Shepherds love this added to their dry food
customer_reviews.author: Knott4U

customer_reviews.title: Its a perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I pour it over my dogs food. Its a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B. Vicioso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's the only way i can get her to eat
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: 70% water 30 Chicken
customer_reviews.text: There was more water and only a little bit of chicken. My dog didn't even eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and there's not "horrible" after effects.
customer_reviews.author: Just Trying to Help

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t care for just her dry food and tries most of the flavors for her and this seems to be her favorite. Cleans her bowl every time.
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: This topper is a terrific idea.
customer_reviews.text: My corgi is unlike other corgis. He's not that much into food but still has a tendency to gain weight even with the right servings for the breed. He sniffs his food and passes on it. I think some dogs get tired of eating the same thing over and over to the point some will just snub at the food given. This topper is a terrific idea. I sat his bowl down, he sniffed and went back to his bed. I received the item yesterday, opened one packet today and poured it over his food. It was gone in 60 seconds. He actually licked the bowl. Very happy with the shreds.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: some of the packets smelled absolutely horrible! my dog wouldnt go near it
customer_reviews.text: some of the packets smelled absolutely horrible! my dog wouldnt go near it, such a shame for the price i paid and i always get this brand
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies and this is great for his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Peterdh203

customer_reviews.title: Purchased different toppers like CORE and they turned up their nose at it ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Teddy Bear dogs would not eat all the different kinds of kibble. Purchased different toppers like CORE and they turned up their nose at it after a day or so. Now am feeding them a Raw diet of real food. They love it. Funny how all this pre packaged junk touts the fact that it is real food. So why not feed 'real food'. More work but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Baker

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. There is so little meat shreds that I don't think there is more than a tablespoon and a half in the packet. It's all watery juice. Yes my dogs love it but it is way to expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked these pouches a lot. He can be picky with canned and wet foods. This looks boneless skinless breasts that i cook and shred for him. It is nice to have something on hand and not cook for him. We do feed him dry food, but a good portion of his diet is cooked human foods - chicken, rice, eggs, beef, and raw lamb chops. He gets really bored with just dry foods and he has to stay grain free or he breaks out with rashy patches and he scratches like crazy. These shredded pouches only have a few ingredients and look like real food. He likes them, I like the convenience while still giving him something healthy.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenName

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it... sans the broth
customer_reviews.text: Not every food gets my dog's seal of approval, but this one does. He loves the taste of the shreds (chicken, salmon, and pumpkin), which I put as a topper on his kibble. In our case, I poured off the broth since he does not like his kibble to be mushy, and he dug in. I have used Wellness products for many years and feel that they are one of the best dog food companies out there, so I am pleased that my dog likes this taste. However, I will suggest that the manufacturer make a version without the broth for those dogs (like mine) that likes his food crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: The Writing Chef

customer_reviews.title: but my dog tells me that it's pretty good. The ingredients list looks quite attractive too
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tasted any, but my dog tells me that it's pretty good. The ingredients list looks quite attractive too, so I'm happy to let her eat it. I'm not planning to feed it to her all the time, but I think it'll make a good choice for the odd occasion when she has an upset stomach and I'd normally be cooking some chicken to mix with rice. I can just feed her a little of this, or maybe add rice, and save myself a few steps while giving her something a little more fun.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great as a dry food topper.
customer_reviews.text: I love Wellness products because i feel safe giving them to my fur kids. Also, they have yet to turn their noses up to any Wellness meal or goodie. The are small - perfect for a dry food topper and contain a significant amount of liquid vs the other contents, but again great for adding to a dry food. The dogs love the taste, so it's a hit. Maybe a bit pricey for the size and a bit messy to open. Stand back a bit tearing in to that envelope or you'll be licked all night. Not so much outta love, either!
customer_reviews.author: DonMac

customer_reviews.title: Wheaten didn't like the broth
customer_reviews.text: My Wheaten had no use for this product after I put it unto his Fromm's Pork and Applesauce dry kibble and I had to throw the entire meal into the garbage. He's not accustomed to wet food and the liquid in the pouch was a put-off for him as he usually eats dry kibble with cut up pork or chicken breast. The pouch is convenient for adding just a bit of topping for a dog who doesn't like dry kibble, but mine has been eating the dry Fromm's for years and I guess I'll just continue along that way.
customer_reviews.author: asiana

customer_reviews.title: Not a balanced meal; meant to be used as topper or snack. Our picky pooch likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Our picky pooch likes this. This is not a balanced meal & is meant to be used as a topper or snack. It has a lot of liquid in it & I can't see any pumpkin. If I tear a pouch open, I invariably splat some on my clothes so I prefer cutting the pouch with scissors. I am not crazy about the pouch design because food will stick in the bottom & I need to use a spoon to get it all out. This stuff is expensive so I won't throw any little shreds out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't excite my dog
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a topper on my dog's food, and he seemed indifferent. He ate it and the food underneath it, but it didn't especially pique his interest. The juice isn't exactly gravy but it does saturate the food. The included shreds, are rather meager, so I wouldn't suggest this is a stand alone food option. The price is a bit much too.
customer_reviews.author: Shane O. Laake

customer_reviews.title: Great to change things up and soften food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the taste of this. This has been a great way to soften my dog's food without giving her digestive problems. She has trouble eating hard food because most of her teeth have been pulled. But I can't feed her soft food or her stools get runny. (I know... TMI!) It also adds variety to her meals so she's not eating the same meal every day.
customer_reviews.author: RatherBeTraveling

customer_reviews.title: Gravy on the top!
customer_reviews.text: Each pouch contains about half broth and half shredded meat and veggies. There is only about 5% veg. The contents, upon opening, smell fresh and tasty. The test pets are berserk to get at the topping and the brothed dry food under it. This is targeted for dogs, but the family cat liked it on his dry portion, too. It is a good way to add interest to kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: The Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this to give the dog some variety in his meals. Our dog is allergic to grains, so this was great for him. He seemed to enjoy this topper, but he's a dog so eats most anything.. I liked that small number of natural ingredients. There were no ill effects with the dog's stomach, so we were happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is from Thailand!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize the product is imported from Thailand. I prefer to give my dog USA made ingredients. My dog didn't like it that much. Hard to get all the stuff out of the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: SwanLily

customer_reviews.title: Good, healthy, low calorie
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients in this dog food are high quality. The pouch has only 42 calories. It's a little more liquid than I thought it would be. It's grain free, low calorie which I like. Unfortunately my dog isn't too thrilled. However he prefers dry food and usually won't eat any dog food that's moist.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Dogs sniffed and walked away..they are spoiled but prefer Purina canned to this expensive stuff..
customer_reviews.author: Geo Haas

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I put it over the dry food in hopes that she would eat the dry food. She loved it but left most of the dry food
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Guay

customer_reviews.title: They love this!
customer_reviews.text: My mini longhair dachshunds love this on top of their dog food. I usually grill boneless chicken breast for them to cut up and add to their dog food. One of my three dachshunds is a very picky eater. I tried this as a healthy nutritious substitute for when I'm going out to dinner and not cooking at home. I think they might like this better than grilled chicken breast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crump

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Natural Food
customer_reviews.text: We love that this is a natural product that is good for our dogs. Although the dogs haven't spoken, apparently they love the taste. We put this on top of their dry food and it disappeared rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs and Cats BOTH Love It
customer_reviews.text: Dogs and Cats BOTH Love It I have to mix it well in with the doggies' kibbles OR the cats will eat ALL the shreds. The dogs really do like it when I mix the juice in too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynrie

customer_reviews.title: Few ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: No fillers, dog love it. My 11 year old boston terrier enjoys it by itself or as a topping.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

customer_reviews.title: My fat dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have a loaf of a pitbull and he loves these things
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks like people food
customer_reviews.text: Mix it with my boxers dry food. She loves it. Thats all that counts
customer_reviews.author: Dclady

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this product
customer_reviews.text: ‘‘This is a wonderful food addictive or topper for dog food. I have 2 Cavalier King Charles Spaniels and I am able to get 4 servings out of each pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Bott

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved it. When sick this would encourage my dog to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

product_meta.title: Wellness Natural Pet Food Wet
product_meta.description: Size:2.8-Ounce Pouch| Color:SeafoodCORE Simply Shreds are made with only five simple, natural ingredients including premium shredded protein and diced veggies. This grain-free, filler-free boost of pure protein is perfect for topping or snacking.
feature_bullets: Grain Free: Simply Shreds Can Be Used As A Mixer, Topper, Or Snack To Be Added To A Complete & Balanced Food Diet
Protein Focused: Simple Recipe, Using 4 Ingredients Or Less, Made With Real Beef In A Broth
All Natural: Contains Only Premium, All Natural Ingredients With No Meat By-Products, Artificial Flavors, Colors Or Preservatives
Easy To Serve: Easy-Open, Individual-Serve Cups Make Mealtime Quick And Easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
